balloonsTowerDefence

Class MonkeyTower

  • java.lang.Object
    • balloonsTowerDefence.MonkeyTower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Entity
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MonkeyTowerDartMonkey, MonkeyTowerIceMonkey, MonkeyTowerNinjaMonkey, MonkeyTowerSuperMonkey

    public abstract class MonkeyTower
extends java.lang.Object
implements Entity
    This is the super class to all others that extend it and has the base frame work for the towers
